name: Don't Stare
description:
After a house party goes wrong and shatters your gang, leave your room to get your best friends back together, avoiding basic human interaction from overly friendly strangers in the most realistic horror game to date! Face your fears as you learn about theirs, with each friend having their own struggles, just like the ones you have in real life that you keep forgetting to text!

Don't Stare is the most accurate depiction of your life ever made.


Meet a hilariously bizarre cast of extroverts, and spend every second avoiding them!

Feel your heart race as the extroverts approach in force, and make your dreams come true by unleashing a flurry of parkour to avoid basic conversation! By making - and breaking - eye contact, compel the extroverts in your way to trigger their abilities, and lead them like a pied piper to have conversations between each other instead.

The extroverts won't give up easy, giving chase using everything from laser beams to teleportation to trap you.


Your friends need you! Ranging from fitness freaks to what is very likely Jeff Goldblum's illegitimate child, brave the dangers outside your room to bring your friends back together, so you can spam them memes in the group chat again at 3 AM!


Explore breathtaking environments you've never seen before, like the Grocery Store, The Gym, and the House Party! Uncover every crevice and find all the juicy collectibles like new clothes, or cryptic graffiti!


Order packages online like money is no obstacle and build your dream room! Neon lights, spooky skeletons, or pure Scandinavian minimalism, create the perfect room to vibe in between the terrible treks outside among people.




Customize your introvert to heighten your trauma bonding with the pixels on screen! Choose between hoodies, zany hoodies, and a myriad of clothing options to perfectly express the person you're trying to hide inside your hood.

OTHER FEATURES, I GUESS

  • You can pet the dog: level checkpoints are cute animals that refill your social energy.
  • Got my cool shades on: find powerups like headsets and cool sunglasses to free you from the extrovert menace.
  • BOSS BATTLE: Summon your friends to conquer nail-bitingly difficult boss fights, answering questions like "How's your mom doing?" and "Have you applied for university yet?"
  • Pretend like we aren't in a pandemic: A world where the worst consequence of ignoring personal space is annoying conversation!
  • Unbreakable Power of Friendship: Get new powers like flexing through walls and learning to tell extroverts "no thank you, I don't have time for conversation today."
  • Oh, and there are also secret side missions. Yeah, so start getting stressed for that 100% completion now!
